name: Diver (MadVanz)
description:
Diver is a stealth-platformer, avoid the lights on 20 different stages using your mysterious Diving ability, that allows you to dive onto solids!

Controls FunctionControl Scheme #1 Control Scheme #2Control Scheme #3Moving and aiming Arrow keys WASD keys Arrow keys Jumping SpaceJ Control Diving X K Shift Pausing Enter Enter Enter Muting M M M
